responsibilities: Developed and optimized distributed system architectures using Python and Go for high-concurrency research simulations.
Authored peer-reviewed research on algorithmic efficiency in cloud computing environments, resulting in a 15% improvement in processing latency.
Collaborated with senior researchers to implement automated testing frameworks for experimental software prototypes.
Conducted extensive benchmarking of various data structures in C++ to determine memory overhead in real-time applications.
Built custom data visualization tools to interpret large datasets generated by kernel-level monitoring software.
Presented research findings on software-defined networking at a regional technical symposium.
